CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 10, 1951, pg. 32, reads: "First Halloween - Little Crystal Brandon, age 8 months, foster daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Charles (Teenie) Harris of Mulford Street, grins gleefully in celebration of her first Halloween. No wonder, her foster father carved this jack-o-lantern for her and posed this cute picture."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Crystal Harris posed behind jack-o-lantern on dining room table, in home of Charles "Teenie" Harris, 7604 Mulford Street
